tasks.label: Publish
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter publish

tasks.label: Run
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter run

tasks.label: Build APK release
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build apk --split-per-abi --release

tasks.label: Build APK debug
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build apk --split-per-abi --debug

tasks.label: Build APK profile
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build apk --split-per-abi --profile

tasks.label: Build AAB release
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build appbundle

tasks.label: Build IOS release
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build ios --release --no-codesign

tasks.label: Build IOS debug
tasks.command: flutter clean ; flutter pub get ; flutter build ios --debug --no-codesign

tasks.label: Install Freezed
tasks.command: flutter pub add freezed_annotation ; flutter pub add --dev build_runner ; flutter pub add --dev freezed ; flutter pub add json_annotation ; flutter pub add --dev json_serializable
